biblebot:
**BeukBot v<biblebotversion> (syne kent as HolyBot) by vipr an UnimatrixZeroOne** - code: <https://github.com/UnimatrixZeroOne/BibleBot>

```biddins:
* `+<setversion> ABBV` - set preferred version tae ABBV
* `+<version>` - see whit version ye hae set
* `+<versions>` - see the stuited versions
* `+<random>` - get a random Beuk verse
* `+<verseoftheday>` (`+<votd>`) - get the verse o the day
* `+<headings> <enable>/<disable>` - enable or disable topic headings
* `+<versenumbers> <enable>/<disable>` - enable or disable verse nummers frae shawin on ilk line
* `+<language>` - see yer current leed, gif ane is set (default: english)
* `+<setlanguage> LANG` - set preferred leed tae LANG
* `+<languages>` - see the supported leeds```
**Tae uise it, juist say a Beuk verse. A'll haundle the lave.**
